Parameters.Name: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 Features detection
Test.Name: GetServices and Digest suported
Test.Description: GetServices - supported. Digest - supported.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Recording can be created Annex A.6: DynamicRecordings="true"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response. A.10: № of recordings = MaxRecordings
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Number of existing recordings equal to MexRecordings Annex A.6: DynamicRecordings="true"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response. A.10: Fault on DeleteRecording
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Number of existing recordings equal to MexRecordings DUT sends fault message Annex A.6: Attempt to set recording configuration. DUT sends fault message

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response. A.10: recordings can not be deleted
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Recordings can not be deleted Annex A.6: Set config for existing recording

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response. Annex A.6: DynamicRecordings="false"
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Recording can be created Annex A.6: DynamicRecordings="false"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: No event with topic tns1:RecordingConfig/DeleteRecording
Test.Description: DUT returns no event with topic tns1:RecordingConfig/DeleteRecording on GetEventPropertiesResponse

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: Event with topic tns1:RecordingConfig/DeleteRecording is propery event
Test.Description: DUT returns event with topic tns1:RecordingConfig/DeleteRecording which is property event

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: Event without Source.SimpleItem
Test.Description: DUT returns event with topic tns1:RecordingConfig/DeleteRecording without Source.SimpleItem

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: Event has Source.SimpleItem with wrong Name
Test.Description: DUT returns event with topic tns1:RecordingConfig/DeleteRecording has Source.SimpleItem with wrong Name

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: Event has Source.SimpleItem with wrong Type
Test.Description: DUT returns event with topic tns1:RecordingConfig/DeleteRecording has Source.SimpleItem with wrong Type

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Annex A.6: Fault on CreateRecordingResponse message
Test.Description: Annex A.6: Fault on CreateRecordingResponse message

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: No CreateRecordingResponse message
Test.Description: The DUT did not send CreateRecordingResponse message.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: No CreatePullPointSubscriptionResponse message
Test.Description: The DUT did not send CreatePullPointSubscriptionResponse message.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: No GetEventPropertiesResponse message
Test.Description: The DUT did not send GetEventPropertiesResponse message.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: No PMSPullMessagesResponse message
Test.Description: DUT did not send PMSPullMessagesResponse message

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: Wrong Topic
Test.Description: Wrong topic in notification

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: Wrong UTC-Time
Test.Description: DUT sends message with wrong UTC-Time

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: no Source.SimpleItem item with Name="RecordingToken"
Test.Description: DUT sends message without Source.SimpleItem item with Name="RecordingToken"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: Source.SimpleItem item with wrong Name
Test.Description: DUT sends message without Source.SimpleItem item with wrong Name

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: message for not existing RecordingJobToken
Test.Description: DUT sends message for not existing RecordingJobToken

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: DUT sends 2 messages
Test.Description: DUT sends 2 messages instead of 1

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: Expected notification after empty PM
Test.Description: Set Operation delay to 30 s DUT sends PM without events Then DUT sends expected notification

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-7 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE RECORDING EVENT
Test.Name: There is not expected event: no events
Test.Description: SDUT sends PMs responses with no events Check that TT will wait operation delay for catching of event Check for different Operation delay values (10 s, 30 s, 60 s)
